__comment: Format of comments: param = description : accepted_value_1 | acccepted_value_2

general.__comment: hostapdmanacmd = path to hostapd-mana executable, or command name if in path : path | name; nm = whether to disable NetworkManager and enable it back after hostapd-mana has stopped : true | false; dnsmasqcmd = path or name of the dnsmasq executable : path | name; inetinterface = name of the interface to use for internet : name | empty string if unused

ap.__comment: interface = interface name : name; loud = advertise to all devices : true | false; type = type of AP (enterprise unsupported for now) : normal | enterprise; name = AP name; password = network password if using personal : password
ap.name: My WiFi

proxy.__comment: logfile = file to log requests to : none | path; burp = use Burp Suite as proxy : 0 for no | proxy port

addresses.__comment: address = http(s) address to serve the file for : http[s]://youraddress/yourpath; file = path to file to serve : path; headers = the headers object : object with headers
